nodes.bodyText: retainOldLighting?
unpack(To)LocalX, so on
nodes.diffHunk:

 		ARG 0 center

nodes.bodyText:
That would be inconsistent with the other methods, although I also like that more :-|
Also, "getPacked..." should be "packLocalPos", would you also favor that change together with renaming all of these to "unpack..."?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,6 +75,34 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4076 net/minecraft/util/math/ChunkSectionPos

 		ARG 0 center
 		ARG 1 radius

nodes.bodyText: Oh and also inconsistent with the functions to pack/unpack the position of chunk positions themselves.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,6 +75,34 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4076 net/minecraft/util/math/ChunkSectionPos
 	METHOD method_22446 stream (Lnet/minecraft/class_1923;I)Ljava/util/stream/Stream;
 		ARG 0 center
 		ARG 1 radius
+	METHOD method_30551 getPackedLocalPosX (S)I

nodes.bodyText: Yeah getPacked is accessing a packed value. However there is no packed value to access here: the packed value is rather passed by the method caller and the unpacked value is returned. Hence unpack than getPacked, and other getPacked methods need fixing as well If they are unpacking a value than accessing a packed value.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,6 +75,34 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4076 net/minecraft/util/math/ChunkSectionPos

 		ARG 0 center
 		ARG 1 radius
+	METHOD method_30551 getPackedLocalPosX (S)I

nodes.bodyText:
No, what I mean the other method is actually doing the packing :-D
But I take that as a yes.
